channel.title: football on Pumpkin Fry
channel.description: Recent content in football on Pumpkin Fry

item.title: 90 mins is too much
item.description: “Some people think fantasy football is a matter of life and death. I don’t like that attitude. I can assure them it is much more serious than that.” ― @FFScout_Shankly Football has been a thing in my life from the age of nine or ten. In the very early days, I was a Drogba stan. Then I watched Klopp’s Dortmund. It changed me. I became a Bundesliga fan. Front foot, gegenpressing football is the pinnacle of football thinking, in my opinion.
